reviews.review: Однозначно стоит пройти!

C'est dingue qu'en 2004, Valve ai fait un jeu qui tient tête techniquement à des jeux sorties en 2016, techniquement sur :
Le moteur physique bien sûr
le level design; notamment les premiers niveaux où on enchaîne l'action non stop
le fun; je me suis vraiment amusé, rien à battre de qui je suis, ou ce que je fais, je m'appelle le Destructeur et c'est tout
Le doublage anglais, les expressions faciales en 244p bluffantes
L'intelligence artificielle, c'est la même depuis 2004, on dirait que c'est ce jeu qui a posé les bases?
Le scénario; n'ayant pas fait le 1, je pensais qu'il ne servait qu'à amuser le joueur, pour moi c'était pas du sérieux, d'ailleurs au début on n'a pas vraiment d'objectif, et la suite des objectifs c'est sauver des personnes et arrêter le grand méchant. Et maintenant à la fin du 2 je veux voir la suite.

J'avais peur que ça soit trop "rétro" et ben que nenni !

шедевр

Das Spiel ist sehr sehr, sehr gut !, es geht sehr lang wenn man Spiele generell sehr intensiv (wie ich) geniest und ist auch sehr spannungsreich gemacht, zumindest für mich als Anfänger der Half-Live Serie. Ich war 5 Tage damit beschäftigt. Schade ist nur das man nicht mit der rechten Maustaste mit Kimme und Korn zielen kann sondern nur indirekt mit seiner Waffe die man hat, zielen kann, aber das ist nicht problematisch.
Ich bin heute noch begeistert, da es ein älteres Game ist, das es schon so extrem spannungsgeladen gemacht wurde von den Entwicklern. Es ähnelt ca. Wolfenstein da ich auch diese Games spiele, ich werde die restlichen Half-Live Spiele und die
DLCs und andere auch noch kaufen und ich denke das sie zu meinen Lieblingsspielen dazukommen, ich Perspektive und
schnellspeicherungsmöglichkeit sind für mich ein MUSS ! Es ist glaube ich von anderen schon alles dazu kommentiert, 
es ist sehr zu empfehlen und warscheinlich auch die restlichen Spiele der Serie .

A gem of gaming history. If you even do a short dive into this franchise's history, you'll find what a stand out, jaw-dropping achievement it was for the time and in the history of gaming as a whole. If I was allowed only one FPS to play for the rest of time, it would be Half-Life 2.

 Lo que hizo Source con Half Life es darle más fuidez, tanto a los ambientes (tanto interiores como exteriores), las armas y a la jugabilidad.
Los gestos de los rostros es algo que otros juegos con más recursos no han podido alcanzar.
La historia es intrigante y se entiende más que en HL1.
Los personajes son más interactuables y se percibe mejor la historia.
Los bichos son increibles (pero hay que matarlos x/ ) [los cangrejos siguen siendo los más odiosos]

Super gierka, trzyma w napięciu a wokoło dzieje się dużo, nagłe zdarzenia powodują że musimy szukać innych ścieżek, fabuła jest nieco mroczna, fizyka w tym tytule może być pozytywnym zaskoczeniem, ponieważ mamy możliwość rzucania beczkami, lub innymi napotkanymi przedmiotami w przeciwników. Polecam kupić na promocji gdyż za taką niską cenę jest niewiele dobrych tytułów.
The Gem of Valve. That's all I have to say.

Absolutely recommend this game; especially with the price on steam. This game is very good and holds up very well despite being over 10 years old. I would also recommend picking up episodes 1 and 2 for the full experience; however you will feel heartbroken when you finish episode 2 as it is the final instalment of this series. If you have never played Half Life 2 before then I would recommend this game 100% for newcomers as you will fall in love with this series very quickly. Go and buy this game now!

Классика жанра. История любимого Гордона спустя много лет после каскадного резонанса в "Черной Мезе". Шикарная игра, с невероятным и нужными саундтреками во время различной динамики. Для 2004 года это просто вынос мозга, насколько Вольво продвинулись ещё тогда. Обязательно покупайте и проходите!

While I personally prefer Half Life 1, Half Life 2 is a pillar of gaming as we know it today and has influenced nearly every single video game since whilst still holding up on it's own as an stellar puzzle game and fps. Id recommend you obtain the valve pack next time it is on sale as HL2 has little to offer other than optimization 
 and mods once you've completed it. I'd give it a solid 8/10 for an intense level of originality, variety, good music and an overall great story with loads of world building and connecting between the various games in the series.

An awesome game. Played trough it around 10 times. I personally would reccomend HL2 Mmod- mod for this game. It adds new graphic options, better gun models, rebalanced gunplay and much much more. 8 bucks is a good price for this game. 10/10 would buy again.

But i suppose if you are new, and REALLY havent heard about HL then just get it.. id recommend you get "Black Mesa" or just get the original HL1? but Black Mesa is seriously good and it is HL1, just re-mastered, however you dont NEED to play the first one in order to enjoy the second, but the story is SOOOOO good, and you do yourself a great injustice by denying yourself the greatness of HL1.. anyways, you will not be disapointed with this game! one of the best games of all time, IMO..

I would like to point out that I only have a short playtime of 50 hours at the time of writing, So my opinion might change. This game is great. The graphics are great considering this was released in 2004. The story is great. The puzzles can be understood without a tutorial. The physics are good. Overall, this is a fantastic game which I would recommend to everybody. If you don't have this game, get it.

easily my favorite game from its decade. Game is linear, but its fun to mess around in and you can do a bit of exploration in the regular maps.

It had always been a dream of mine that one day I could get a PC and finally understand firsthand why many people adored this game. And honestly, after playing it, this was one of the best games I've ever played. Guns were satisfying, controls were great, level designs are expertly made, story is spectacular, and the interaction between you and the world of Half-Life 2 felt better than games existing today.

Some complaints though are within the floaty handling of vehicle sections and some parts of the game lingering longer than they should (not a terrible amount of them, but some).

Overall, this is a MUST play for PC owners. Not only is it a really fun game, but also a really smart one.

A classic, without doubt. If you haven't played it, you should give it a try.

Plays wonderfully on low end PCs and runs well under linux, too. Graphics have aged relatively well.
This story is incredible. The players choices and the enviornments just mesh incredibly well. The problem solving and how you can solve a puzzle in your own way is amazing. I definetly recommend it
